short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for ByteBelli web app (bytebelli.com) to save and annotate content from websites natively.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✨ ByteBelli Chrome Extension – Your All-in-One Content Saver 🖇️

Save anything, from anywhere – with just one click! ByteBelli lets you effortlessly capture content from your favorite platforms right where you see them:

🌐 Web Links & Articles
✏️ Highlights & Quotes
🐦 Tweets
🎵 TikToks
📸 Instagram Posts
📺 YouTube Videos
👾 Reddit Threads
📌 Pinterest Pins
🗣️ Looms

📚 Annotate, Tag, & Share – Add your thoughts, organize with tags, and share.
🧠 Centralize Your Inspiration – All your saved content lives in one place: in your Belli. For the best experience, create your Belli on bytebelli.com.

Unleash your creativity and keep your best ideas in one place. 🚀
Get inspired with ByteBelli :)
